alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chautauqua; Cowley; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:51PM CDT until May 09 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cowley County in south central Kansas... Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Butler County in south central Kansas... Sumner County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Chautauqua County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 451 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Leon to Andale, moving southeast at 10 mph. 60 mph winds are occurring well ahead of the precipitation area, along the leading gust front. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, El Dorado, Arkansas City, Winfield, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Wellington, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Cheney, Douglass and Belle Plaine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 19. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
